sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../styles/Dashboard.css'; function Dashboard({ initialData, onSubmit }) { const [selectedTab, setSelectedTab] = useState("My Profile"); const [data, setData] = useState(initialData); const [profileData, setProfileData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", organization: "", }); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ sector: '', dataSensitivity: '', digitalFootprint: '', employees: '', revenue: '', itInvestment: '', cyberMaturity: '', thirdPartyDependencies: '' }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = () => { // Check if all fields are filled const isFormComplete = Object.values(formData).every((value) => value.trim() !== ''); if (!isFormComplete) { setError('All fields are mandatory. Please fill out all the fields.'); return; } console.log('Dashboard Data:', formData); setError(''); // Clear any previous errors onSubmit(); //navigate('/questionnaire'); // Navigate to the questionnaire page }; const [layersData, setLayersData] = useState([ { name: "Layer 1", topics: [ { name: "Topic 1.1", selected: true }, { name: "Topic 1.2", selected: true }, ], }, { name: "Layer 2", topics: [ { name: "Topic 2.1", selected: true }, { name: "Topic 2.2", selected: true }, ], }, ]); const handleTopicSelection = (layerIndex, topicIndex) => { const updatedLayers = [...layersData]; updatedLayers[layerIndex].topics[topicIndex].selected = !updatedLayers[layerIndex].topics[topicIndex].selected; setLayersData(updatedLayers); }; const handleSave = () => { console.log("Saved data:", layersData); alert("Your custom evaluation settings have been saved."); }; const renderContent = () => { switch (selectedTab) { case "My Profile": return (

My Profile

{/* Personal Information */}
Name:
Organization:
Email:
{/* Questions Section */}

Organizational Details

{/* Error Message */} {error &&
{error}
}
{/* Repeat this structure for all other fields */}
); case "Customize Evaluation": return (

Customize Evaluation

Note that unselect all those topics which your organization does not have:

{layersData.map((layer, layerIndex) => (

{layer.name}

    {layer.topics.map((topic, topicIndex) => (
    • ))}
))}
); case "Start Evaluation": return (

Start Evaluation

Yet to be

); case "Score": return (

Score

Good Points: 80
Risk Score: 20
Improvement: 70
Final Measure: Moderate

Risk is moderate. Implement additional measures.

Top Areas of Improvement

  • Data Encryption
  • Access Control

Security Progress

Graph Placeholder
{["Topic 1", "Topic 2", "Topic 3", "Topic 4", "Topic 5"].map( (topic, index) => (

{topic}

Doughnut Chart
) )}
); case "Detailed Analysis": return (

Detailed Analysis

{/* First Box */}

Overall Score

Comprehensive breakdown of all scores will be displayed here.

{/* Second Box */}

Topic-wise Analysis

  • Topic 1

    Good Points: Robust data encryption.

    Areas of Improvement: Better access control.

  • Topic 2

    Good Points: Strong password policies.

    Areas of Improvement: Regular audits.

); case "Assessment Logs": return (

Assessment Logs

  • 2024-12-01 - Score: 80
  • 2024-12-02 - Score: 70
); default: return null; } }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}

SecuriFi

  • setSelectedTab("My Profile")}>My Profile
  • setSelectedTab("Customize Evaluation")}> Customize Evaluation
  • setSelectedTab("Start Evaluation")}> Start Evaluation
  • setSelectedTab("Score")}>Score
  • setSelectedTab("Detailed Analysis")}> Detailed Analysis
  • setSelectedTab("Assessment Logs")}> Assessment Logs
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Top Navbar */}
Dashboard
{/* Content Area */} {renderContent()}
); }; export default Dashboard;
